ingredients.ingredient: 2 tablespoons olive oil, divided, or as needed
½ cup cooked Italian sausage, or to taste
½ cup cooked mushrooms, or to taste
½ cup cooked red onions, or to taste

cookingTips: Divide dough in half to create two thin rounds for even cooking
Brush outside of dough with oil and cook on griddle before adding toppings for a crispy exterior
Use pre-cooked fillings so they don't release excess moisture during grilling
enrichment.coachingPrompt: A pizzadilla is pizza in sandwich form. How will you achieve crispy exteriors while keeping the filling warm and the cheese melted?
